title: Tagliatelle with asparagus and mushrooms
ingredients: ['1/2 (500g) packet tagliatelle pasta', '1 tablespoon olive oil', '1 large bunch asparagus, trimmed and cut into small pieces', '4 tablespoons chicken stock', '1/2 teaspoon dried crushed chillies', '1 (200g) punnet mushrooms, sliced', '50g (2 oz) freshly grated Parmesan cheese']
